Who is Shanquella Robinson?
A 25-year-old hair braider from North Carolina
Where did Shanquella Robinson die?
San José del Cabo, Mexico
What was the cause of death listed on Shanquella Robinson's death certificate?
Severe spinal cord injury and atlas luxation
What did a video that emerged on the internet in November show?
Shanquella Robinson being beaten in a hotel room
What did Robinson's family initially believe was the cause of her death?
Alcohol poisoning
To whom did the Robinson family send a letter demanding federal prosecution or extradition?
US President Joe Biden and Secretary of State Antony Blinken
Which agencies investigated Robinson's death?
FBI agents and Department of Justice prosecutors
What did the US Attorney’s Office for the Western District of North Carolina announce on Wednesday?
They could not prove that any federal crime had been committed
What did Robinson family attorney Sue-Ann Robinson say about the US autopsy findings?
The US autopsy did not discover any spinal cord injuries
What do civil rights attorney Ben Crump and the Robinson family believe?
Justice is still possible for her death via prosecutors in Mexico
